name: Chocolate makes you happy: Easter
description:
Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, flowers, butterflies, Easter eggs and explosions.
The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level.

In Chocolate makes you happy: Easter:
- 50 levels
- Explosions
- Jumpers
- Teleports
- Sweets
- Accelerators
- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Treadmills
- Flowers
- Butterflies
- Easter eggs
- Easter Art
